description.narrative: Promoting and Protection of Human Rights and democratisation in the South and East Mediterranean Region through partnership agreement with the EuroMed Rights and the Euro-Mediterranean Foundation of Support to Human Rights Defenders (EMHRF). The aim is to strengthen human rights and democratic reforms in the region through networking and the provision of flexible financial support to human rights NGOs and defenders locally and regionally. The intervention will 1) strengthen partnerships between human rights organizations and activists in the Southern Neighbourhood of the EU as well as in Europe; 2) enhance their capacity to promote human rights values and advocate for a wide range of reform related issues (among these freedom of association and assembly; the independence of the judiciary; gender equality and women¿s rights; economic and social rights; anti-discrimination; the right of migrants and refugees); 3) provide flexible funding to human rights defenders at risk as well as to emerging and sensitive local human rights initiatives adapted to local developments.
